SQL_STMT_U.val: select cast(sum(CDRD_AMOUNT) as decimal(13,2)) from :1/CDRD where CDRD_ADMNO = :2 and CDRD_CLNTNO = :3 and CDRD_DEPNO = :4 for fetch only
